segments.text: hello , do you remember me ? I bought some vases from you yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , you sent them to New York , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's right . I thought I'd come back to buy some more souvenirs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , first , I'd like to buy a few postcards . My sister used to always send a postcard to herself whenever she went anywhere . I want to do that , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: we have plenty of postcards to choose from here . The same designs can be found on these posters .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: posters are difficult to travel with . I think I'll just buy the postcards . I heard that you might also have some of the masks that are made in Venice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes , we do . They're on the wall behind you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: the prices are clearly marked on the back of each mask . Would you like me to get one down for you to look at ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , I think I'd like the green mask in the middle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll take it , I'd also like to buy some chocolate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: are you looking for some homemade chocolate as a gift .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , it's my girlfriend's birthday today and she loves chocolate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: we've got plenty to choose from here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: they look delicious . I think she'll be pleased .
segments.speaker: S1
